name: Frontier Of Fantasy
description:
Hi all! I am an inexperienced indie dev and this my first ever (semi) complete game. This was more so a proof of concept more than anything, and I learned a lot. 

Disclaimer: This game has no real ending or purpose, it's a real snoozefest. But you can still try it out if you'd like. 

Controls:

WASD to move

E to interact

Enter to open inventory
